  • Method Details

    • askOptions

      public static int askOptions(ConsoleInterface consoleInterface, NavigableMap<Integer,Option> options)
      Prompts the user to select an option from the given list of options. If the consoleInterface implements the InteractiveConsoleInterface, it will invoke askOptionsInteractive(InteractiveConsoleInterface, NavigableMap) to handle the option selection interactively. Otherwise, it will call askOptionsNonInteractive(ConsoleInterface, Map) to process the options non-interactively.
      Parameters:
      consoleInterface - The console interface used to display and interact with the list of options.
      options - The map of selectable options, where the key is the option ID and the value is the option description.
      Returns:
      The ID of the option selected by the user.

    • askOptionsInteractive

      public static int askOptionsInteractive(InteractiveConsoleInterface consoleInterface, NavigableMap<Integer,Option> options)
      Reads the user's input and return the selected option.
      Parameters:
      consoleInterface - - The console interface use to display the options
      options - - The list of selectable option to be display
      Returns:
      the option id of the selected option given by the user

    • displayOptionsInteractive

      public static void displayOptionsInteractive(InteractiveConsoleInterface consoleInterface, Map<Integer,Option> options, int selectedOption)
      Display the list of options
      Parameters:
      consoleInterface - - The console interface used to display the options
      options - - The list of selectable options to be displayed
      selectedOption - - The option number that is currently selected (highlighted)

    • askOptionsNonInteractive

      Reads the user's input and return the selected option.
      Parameters:

      options - - The list of selectable option to be display
